typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer '000',
		name as string,
		person as string,
		number as integer '000',
		amount1 as decimal(10,0),
		amount2 as decimal(10,0),
		amount3 as decimal(10,0),
		somestring as string,
		category as string,
		amount4 as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename') ~> source1
